description.value: You can take the form of a terrifying aberration. When you Change Shape, you can choose one of the following: gain the effects of a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Enlarge] spell and 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Eldritch Bond] spell; gain the effects of a 2nd-rank enlarge spell and 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting three abilities; or gain the effects of a 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting four abilities. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.
